Title: Criticality of defects in cyclic dependent components
Published: IEEE 13th International Working Conference on Source Code Analysis and Manipulation (SCAM)
Elements_risk_assessment: Depending on how much is related the severity of each bug with the propability of that the fixed commit fix a real bug, according to them the low severity defects mostly points to some cosmetic issues
UseOF-SZZ: They used the SZZ algorithm to map bugs in files with the source code that fixed them
Summary: The goal is identifying the most severe defects that impact reliability based on that the cyclic related components account for a clear majority of those defects in the software. They empirically evaluated 2 projects
